title: gradle build with include build module fails with null pointer

labels.name: triage/needs-reproducer
labels.description: We are waiting for a reproducer.

body:
### Describe the bug

I have two projects _A_ and _B_ containing _moduleA_ and _moduleB_ respectively. _moduleA_ dependes on _moduleB_. Compilation of project _A_ with include build of _B_ fails with a null pointer. The same compilation without the include build works fine.

### Expected behavior

Compilation should work also with include build

### Actual behavior

The following error is logged:
```
org.gradle.api.internal.tasks.TaskDependencyResolveException: Could not determine the dependencies of task ':application-service:quarkusBuild'.
```

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)
